data.name: Cowhide
data.description: Tanned hide from a cow, used in many basic crafting recipes. Sturdy and versatile.

data.name: Hard Leather
data.description: Toughened leather that has been treated to increase its durability. Excellent for crafting protective gear.

data.name: Fire & Earth Amulet
data.description: An amulet forged with the power of fire and earth. Grants extra vitality and dual elemental protection.

effects.description: Adds 20 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Iron Boots
data.description: Heavy boots that protect your feet and keep you steady, even in the wettest or windiest storms.

effects.description: Adds 40 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Water Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.
Adds 2 Threat to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Iron Sword
data.description: A reliable weapon for any adventurer. The weight of iron gives your strikes extra force.

effects.description: Adds 24 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Leather Boots
data.description: Comfortable boots made from tough leather. They keep your feet warm and safe from hot or rocky ground.

data.name: Mushroom
data.description: A plump, earthy mushroom. Some say it glows faintly at night. Useful for cooking and potions.

data.name: Cooked Shrimp
data.description: A deliciously cooked shrimp, full of energy and perfect for quick recovery after a tough battle.

effects.description: Heal 150 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Leather Armor
data.description: Sturdy armor made from tanned leather. Offers balanced protection and enhances air and water magic.

effects.description: Adds 50 HP to its stats when equipped.

Adds 2% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Adventurer Helmet
data.description: A reliable helmet that has protected many explorers on their journeys. Brings wisdom and strength.

effects.description: Adds 50 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 15 Wisdom to its stats when equipped. Each point of wisdom increases your xp in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 wisdom)

data.description: An elegant amulet that channels both air and water energies. Perfect for those who value versatility.

effects.description: Adds 20 HP to its stats when equipped.

data.description: An enhanced staff that channels powerful water magic. The wood seems to flow like water itself.

effects.description: Adds 24 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.

data.description: Sturdy armor forged from iron plates. Enhances your earth and fire powers while protecting from air and water.

data.description: Iron protection for your legs. Heavy but reliable, with a boost to fiery and earthen attacks.

data.description: A rugged vest worn by seasoned explorers. Many pockets for treasures and a charm for wisdom.

data.description: A solid iron helmet that provides excellent protection against fire and earth attacks.

data.name: Iron Ore
data.description: A chunk of raw iron ore. Can be smelted into iron bars for crafting many useful items.

data.name: Iron Bar
data.description: A solid bar of refined iron, ready for crafting into weapons, armor, and tools.

data.name: Jasper Crystal
data.description: A multihued crystal that shimmers with strange energy.

data.name: Cheese
data.description: A wheel of aged cheese. Surprisingly effective at restoring health when you need it most.

effects.description: Heal 180 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Spruce Wood
data.description: Strong, resinous wood from spruce trees. Popular for building and intermediate crafting.

data.name: Iron Ring
data.description: A simple ring forged from iron. Enhances your damage output in combat.

effects.description: Adds 4% Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Iron Dagger
data.description: A sharp iron dagger, balanced for quick attacks and precise strikes. Perfect for targeting weak points.

effects.description: Adds 17 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 35% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Spruce Plank
data.description: A sturdy plank made from spruce wood. Good for mid-level crafting and construction.

data.name: Shrimp
data.description: A small but tasty shrimp. Can be cooked for a quick health boost.

data.name: Magical Cure
data.description: A mysterious substance that can cure magical ailments and enhance crafting recipes.

data.name: Fire Bow
data.description: A bow that seems to smolder with heat. Its arrows leave trails of fire in the air.

effects.description: Adds 17 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 35% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Iron Pickaxe
data.description: A sturdy pickaxe made of iron. Makes mining more efficient and can double as a weapon.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -20% when a character mines a resource.

data.name: Iron Axe
data.description: A sturdy axe made from iron. Makes woodcutting more efficient and can serve as a weapon in a pinch.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -20% when a character logs a tree.

data.name: Spruce Fishing Rod
data.description: A well-crafted fishing rod made from spruce wood. Makes fishing more efficient.

effects.description: Adds 5 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -20% when a character is fishing.

data.name: Backpack
data.description: A sturdy backpack with plenty of pockets. Expands your carrying capacity for long journeys.

effects.description: Adds 35 to the maximum number of items in the inventory when equipped.

data.name: Earth Boost Potion
data.description: A potion that surges with earthen energy. Grants bonus earth damage at the start of a fight.

effects.description: Add 12% earth damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Air Boost Potion
data.description: A bubbling potion that tingles on your tongue. Increases air damage when battle begins.

effects.description: Add 12% air damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Fire Boost Potion
data.description: Fiery red and warm to the touch. Drink to ignite your attacks with extra fire damage.

effects.description: Add 12% fire damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Water Boost Potion
data.description: A cool, refreshing brew that grants a surge of water damage at the start of battle.

effects.description: Add 12% water damage at the start of the fight and for the rest of the fight.

data.name: Leather Gloves
data.description: Tough gloves that protect your hands while harvesting plants. Also handy for brawls.

effects.description: Adds 5 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -20% when a character harvest a plant.

data.name: Astralyte Crystal
data.description: A crystal that seems to contain a tiny universe within. Stars twinkle in its depths when held to the light.

data.name: Enchanted Fabric
data.description: A silky material that seems to shift colors as it moves. Whispers can be heard when it rustles.

data.name: Forest Ring
data.description: A wooden ring carved with images of trees and wildlife. It resonates with natural energy.

effects.description: Adds 20 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 3% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 15 Wisdom to its stats when equipped. Each point of wisdom increases your xp in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 wisdom)

data.description: Sturdy leg protection made from tanned leather. Flexible enough for quick movement while still offering defense.

data.name: Recall Potion
data.description: A swirling blue potion that instantly transports you back to the world's spawn point when consumed.

effects.description: Teleports to map ID 271 when the item is used.

data.name: Forest Bank Potion
data.description: A shimmering green potion that instantly transports you to the forest bank when consumed.

effects.description: Teleports to map ID 955 when the item is used.

data.name: Golden Shrimp
data.description: An extremely rare shrimp with a metallic golden shell. Prized by collectors and chefs alike.

data.name: Iron Shield
data.description: A sturdy shield of hammered iron with a reinforced rim. Though basic in design, it offers balanced protection against all elemental threats.

Adds 4% Water Res to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Flying Wing
data.description: A delicate wing from a flying creature. Imbued with air magic and useful in crafting.

data.name: Snake Hide
data.description: Sleek, patterned hide from a snake. Used in crafting flexible armor and magical items.

data.name: Snakeskin
data.description: Flexible, scaly skin from a large snake. Its natural patterns make each piece unique and attractive.

data.name: Air Ring
data.description: A light silver ring that crackles with a gentle breeze. Increases your affinity with the element of air.

effects.description: Adds 8% Air Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.description: A blade infused with the power of every type of slime. It's unpredictable, but devastating in skilled hands.
